Choose from the options lettered A- E the one that is nearest in meaning to the word underlined.

We had no doubt about the sufficiency of our grains to see us through the rainy season.
explanation:
sufficiency the condition or quality of being adequate or sufficient.

"the judge would rule on the sufficiency of the provocation"

synonyms: ease · freedom from hardship · repose · relaxation · serenity · tranquillity · contentment · content · well-being · cosiness · enjoyment · luxury · affluence · prosperity ·

Adequacy: the state or quality of being adequate.

"the adequacy of testing procedures"

synonyms:

acceptability · reasonableness · passableness · satisfactoriness · fairness · sufficiency · ampleness · appropriateness · appropriacy · suitability · suitableness

A refugee is a person who has been forced to leave their country in order to escape war, persecution, or natural disaster. 

Fugitive; a person who has escaped from captivity or is in hiding.
